code: var getTotal=function getTotal(targetType,data){if(data.length===0)return 0;var targetArray=data.filter(function(record){return record.type===targetType;});if(targetArray.length===0)return 0;if(targetArray.length===1)return targetArray[0].amount;return targetArray.reduce(function(acc,obj){return acc+obj.amount;},0);};export default getTotal;
